channel.title: weekly-digest on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in weekly-digest on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Weekly Digest #15: New year Gathering: Sharing Tết, starting strong
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We kicked off our gathering after Tết, bringing the community back together in true Dwarves style - dropping some SOL and ICY tokens into everyone’s wallets, bringing the community back together in true Dwarves style.

item.title: Weekly Digest #14: Embracing hybrid work - the best of both worlds
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Since the start, Dwarves has valued flexibility, allowing our team to work where inspiration strikes. But there’s something special about being together—learning, sharing knowledge, and working side by side.

item.title: Weekly Digest #13: More than lines of code
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Welcome to this week’s edition of our roundup, where we highlight the moments that make us more than just lines of code.

item.title: Weekly Digest #12: Summer moments - Our team's remote work adventures
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: You know, there’s something magical about bringing people together around what they love. It might seem simple, but a lot of thought goes into it.

item.title: Weekly Digest #11: Come grow with us
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Things are always cooking on our Discord. So grab a virtual seat at our table, pour yourself a cup of something tasty, and enjoy the digest.

item.title: Weekly Digest #10: From lean to learner
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Double digits, I can’t believe we’ve reached our 10th digest! It’s been quite a journey putting together each edition and a blast creating these for you.

item.title: Weekly Digest #9: A little more speed for summer
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: How quickly the first half of the year speeds up before it slows down. It’s really the second half of 2024 already.

item.title: Weekly Digest #8: Then came the last days of May
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Here’s to hoping for a brighter and better month on this last day of May. We’re in the heat of a community offline meet-up today, gathering to discuss the month’s progress.

item.title: Weekly Digest #7: A journey through time
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The sun peeks over the horizon, Saturday vibes and good news – the perfect combo. We’re about to spice up your weekend with a recap of all the awesome things we whipped up this week.

item.title: Weekly Digest #6: Come for the conversation, stay for the culture
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Hi, it’s @innno_ again. Summer is almost here. But don’t worry, this update is all about making your day more comfortable.

item.title: Weekly Digest #5: Endure the hardship, delay the gratification
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Greetings from Saigon, I’m here again, bringing you a lot of updates. There are big and small things brewing at Dwarves network.

item.title: Weekly Digest #4: Finding your authentic tribe
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Welcome back to the #4 weekly digest after a long holiday. Those Discord channels are still buzzing with active messages. Without further ado, let’s see what I’ve got to share.

item.title: Weekly Digest #3: We all start somewhere
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Huge news is on the horizon. You absolutely will not guess what we’re about to share. We remember last week like it was yesterday, but what truly counts is that you’re here with us.

item.title: Weekly Digest #2: Walk around learn around
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: There are so many amazingly fun and wonderfully weird things happening on Discord, both last week and of course, today. So let’s dive in with a freshly-brewed “cà phê sữa,” of course.

item.title: Weekly Digest #1: What do you stand for?
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Lock in Your Workspace. Show the World. Our Discord crew is buzzing with energy after our last Friday community call, with folks sharing snapshots of their workspaces.
